entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

entry.title: Hitman: Blood Money ‚Äî Reprisal
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$14.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $14.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game UnlockÔºö$14.99

Application Description

PLAY THE FIRST MISSION FOR FREE Begin your killer career with the first of Blood Money‚Äôs massively replayable sandbox missions, then unlock the complete game with a single in-app purchase. === You are Agent 47 ‚Äî a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, ‚ÄúThe Franchise‚Äù. Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracy‚Äôs lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected. Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic ‚Äî complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support. EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Money‚Äôs sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs. THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic ‚Äúaccidents‚Äù. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff. INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways ‚Äî the hallmarks of a professional assassin. ONE STEP AHEAD An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion. COMPLETE CONTROL Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips. === We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money ‚Äî Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues. Supported iPhones: ‚Ä¢ iPhone 8 Plus and later ‚Ä¢ iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later Supported iPads: ‚Ä¢ iPad mini 5 (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad Air 3 (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad 7 (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only ‚Ä¢ iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later ‚Ä¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com Hitman: Blood Money ¬© 2000-2025 IO Interactive A/S. IO Interactive, IOI, HITMAN are registered trademarks of IO Interactive A/S. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

  • GoodNotes 5 UnlockÔºö$9.99

  • Goodnotes 6 (1 Year)Ôºö$11.99

  • Dotted Squares: Draft PapersÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents‚Äîperfect for your next important meeting. ‚Ä¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. ‚Ä¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. ‚Ä¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes‚Äîall without switching tools. ‚Ä¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. ‚Ä¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools ‚Ä¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. ‚Ä¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. ‚Ä¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions ‚Ä¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning ‚Ä¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. ‚Ä¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. ‚Ä¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. ‚Ä¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. ‚Ä¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. ‚Ä¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff‚Äôs department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions ‚Äì and try to keep out of prison yourself! ‚Äì in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It‚Äôs all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn‚Äôt spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriff‚Äôs department. Your subordinates aren‚Äôt just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices ‚Äì and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You‚Äôll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment ‚Äì if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn‚Äôt have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing ‚ÄòTHIS IS THE POLICE 2‚Äô! Get in touch with HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook: HandyGames Subscribe to our YouTube channel: HandyGames Check news on Twitter: @handy_games Follow us on Instagram: handygames Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí $0.49 [$0.49 ~ $4.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö$0.49

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features you‚Äôll love: ‚Ä¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. ‚Ä¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. ‚Ä¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. ‚Ä¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. ¬ª HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. ¬ª How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. ‚Äì TRY PLAYNAV NOW! ‚Äì Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 15 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. ¬ª Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

All Price Information

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features you‚Äôll love: ‚Ä¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. ‚Ä¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. ‚Ä¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. ‚Ä¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. ¬ª HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. ¬ª How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. ‚Äì TRY PLAYNAV NOW! ‚Äì Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 15 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. ¬ª Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other.
